channel.title: Black Mesa will not start
channel.description: Need help! Whenever I try to start Black Mesa from Steam, it seems to boot up, then it closes; no loading screen or error message. Using task manager shows the .exe launching while using 20,000 K memory, before dropping down to 18,000 K or so, then closing. I've verified my game several times and have switched developmental branches several times with no success. Any form of help would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Black Mesa will not start
item.dc:creator: F_SchoManno
item.description:
Forgot to delete this, but I fixed the issue. Turns out I didn’t finish installing the non-beta patch. Let it complete, then it worked again. Thanks for the help though!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa will not start
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
If you are running windows 10 try this.

  1. Go to Black Mesa’s “Properties” and then “Set launch options.”
  2. Enter “-window -noborder”.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa will not start
item.dc:creator: F_SchoManno
item.description:
Need help! Whenever I try to start Black Mesa from Steam, it seems to boot up, then it closes; no loading screen or error message. Using task manager shows the .exe launching while using 20,000 K memory, before dropping down to 18,000 K or so, then closing. I’ve verified my game several times and have switched developmental branches several times with no success. Any form of help would be greatly appreciated!
